reviews.review: Благодаря онлайну на 2-х игроков в этой игре я осознал, что я не один такой тупой в компании друзей
It's a fun puzzle solving game. It is a very difficult game, so I recommend being at least 12. It also has a great story.
Там портал, туда портал... НУ КТО ЖЕ ЗНАЛ ЧТО ОДНУ ТЕСТОВУЮ КАМЕРУ ПРИДЕТСЯ ПРОХОДИТЬ ПОЛ ЧАСА

Portal 2 has got to be my favorite game of all time. Portal 1 was great, but portal 2 took it even farther. Adding a bunch of new mechanics and making the game much longer. (The first is like 2 hours long) I haven't played much of co-op because I have no friends but from what I have played it's pretty good. The fact that this game beats out both TF2, minecraft, and little big planet 2 as my favorite game of all time is a testament to how good it is.
很好玩的合作游戏，和小伙伴能呆一天！

The storyline in the game is one of the most detailed and interesting i have ever played through. The gameplay itself was quite challenging and that just attributed to a really fun experience overall. Absolutely solid game, definitely one of my favourite of all time.
Игра вобще топчик) ещё 1 часть пройдите)
Jogo maravilhoso! Os puzzles são extremamente bem feitos e tem o exato tempo de jogo para não enjoar. Recomendo!!

Классика! Проходил тысячу раз пиратку и тысячу раз на разных аккаунтах. Каждый раз прохожу с такой же радостью, будто в первый раз. Совместно с другом играть очень весело, отключать порталы, на которых ходит друг и наблюдать за его смертью очень круто!!!! Гениальный сюжет, гениальный поворот, становление зла, вынужденная помощь и т.д. Отличная игрушка, отличный сиквел к отличной игре.
любил раньше зависать в этой игре
самая ахуеная игра в мире, но иногда онлаин хуевый
the only valve game with a good campaign
Игра топ. Кнш там много малолеток не адекватных. Я там сам спидранер. Ищу норм спидранера для спидрана в кооп.
Masterpiece. One of the best games of the history and probably the best puzzles game ever.

Wheatly trashed my room and still hasn't apologized or cleaned it up. Can you belive this mf? Aside from that, 10/10 game.

I will never forget that moment... When i booted the game up for the first time, i saw that man with the valve in the back of his head. I am used to the music and him looking off into the distance but.. I didn't think he would do this... He turned around, menacingly, before instantly snapping back to where he was looking... He just turned enough that I couldn't see his face, I looked around my room, to see, a man with a valve in the back of his head.
прикольно но толко если играть через дискод и подобное то голос будет двоится а тка только ёще один минус чуть с другум со смеха не умерли и чуть не посорились

Amazing game, amazing story and experience. Make sure to play Portal 1 (Portal) first to get a backstory on the game as this increases the quality of experience you have in the game. The multiplayer co-op is also great and makes for some interesting funny situations with a friend. You are also able to make your own maps and publish them for others to play, this also being hinted at the trailer "great heist". Overall 10/10 classic that still stands/holds its amazing quality unlike some games today at 2022. 
TLDR: Amazing classic with an amazing story experience. Play it and you will not regret it.
i love the puzzles and great to play with friends

Hey Everyone, this game appeals to me because of the problem solving aspect. I'm not a big gamer by any means, however I can play this for bits at a time. I like the colors, the sarcasm, and the ease into difficulty within the first few levels. It challenges you to think outside the box, quite literally. I hope you enjoy! (Keep in mind, it can be played with two people, which can be equally as fun with twice the brain power.)
this is the greatest game I have ever played. If you are thinking of buying it short answer, YES. the voice acting amazing, the gameplay amazing, its pretty hard and enjoyable an overall 10/10
10/10. One of my favorite games of all time. I wish I could wipe my brain and experience this all over.
muy lindo juego, lo pasé en solo y cooperativo, el nivel de dificultad de los puzzles está bien, nunca me vi dificultado en pasarlos. recomiendo el portal de Mel, ese sí es bastante complicado

Its worth the sale price,
Great game to blow off a couple minutes at a time, and there's a bunch of extra test chambers.

it would induce great nausea in some but others it would be like a roller coaster.

fun for years, unlike many other games
I liked the story line. A lil spooky. I loved it.

You have to think in portals
One of the best games ever made. I don't care what people say about Half Life, this is Valve's magnum opus.

单人模式结尾看到曾经相爱相杀的机器人停止攻击，用合唱的形式为我送行的时候，除了心中泛起的感动，还有为GLaDOS感到的唏嘘。曾经被冠以杀人机器的人工智能最终一人在地下深处无人为伴，这种孤单想必只有她能体会。可是在双人模式里，GLaDOS找到无数实验体时发出的那种由于激动而近似于破音的尖叫让我意识到我和她之间有着不可逾越的鸿沟。

向GLaDOS致敬！向默默付出的无数科研人员致敬！
这都不是好游戏，还有什么游戏是好游戏
I killed my friend with a laser
Muy divertido el coop y la historia muy interesante! recomendado 100% y en oferta 200%

I may not have played for long, but portal, and its predecessor: portal 2, are absolutely amazing games, that provide 'Wow worthy' graphics, and a Mind boggling game play. This game is Highly suggested and has some really good puzzles, and multiplayer! It also has community test chambers which are quite a lot harder, but still keeps the essence. Its repayable, and just listening to the voice actors talk is amazing. It does have some bugs and glitches, but a good 90% will never happen to you (Unless your speed-running, or trying to get them, cause some can save time.) Its up to you the final decision, but personally, i think its great and should be worth way more.

Portal 2 é um jogo extremamente bem feito, desde cenários imersivos, uma história simples mas muito bem executada e principalmente os puzzles, que não te fazem querer parar de jogar, a cada câmara de testes que você termina vem uma vontade de jogar mais 7, recomendo.
Good Fun That Became A good Steam Classic In My Household

good game. better scenario than the 1st one. a very good concept.
a bit too long though. 
some part of the games are too dark. difficult to play even with brightness pushed to the max.
some test rooms are more interesting than others.
still, this game is a must
muito bom pra jogar com amigos
i only play portal because of multiplayer mode so yeah uhh i kinda recommend it
